001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.types;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonSubTypes;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonTypeInfo;
005import java.lang.Integer;
006import java.lang.Long;
007import java.lang.String;
008import java.util.Currency;
009
010@JsonTypeInfo(
011    use = JsonTypeInfo.Id.NAME,
012    include = JsonTypeInfo.As.PROPERTY,
013    property = "__typename"
014)
015@JsonSubTypes({
016    @JsonSubTypes.Type(value = HighPrecisionMoney.class, name = "HighPrecisionMoney"),
017    @JsonSubTypes.Type(value = Money.class, name = "Money")
018})
019public interface BaseMoney {
020  String getType();
021
022  void setType(String type);
023
024  Currency getCurrencyCode();
025
026  void setCurrencyCode(Currency currencyCode);
027
028  Long getCentAmount();
029
030  void setCentAmount(Long centAmount);
031
032  Integer getFractionDigits();
033
034  void setFractionDigits(Integer fractionDigits);
035}
